name: Verethragna
description:
You play as the mythical hero Verethragna, with the ultimate goal of defeating evil! 

He is a Persian God-Warrior who has an unique ability: to transform into 3 fantastic creatures such as a Boar, a Giant Bird and a Camel.

Each transformation offers a different gameplay, which will be more or less favored by the environment, itself composed of multiple paths.

Charge a horde of enemies or sneak through aerial passages...

The choice is yours, as long as the darkness doesn't catch up with you !
